participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: friendly and curious, enjoys engaging in meaningful conversations.
participant_1.background: i am an elementary school teacher. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm fluent in english, spanish, and french. i am interested in photography and like taking pictures.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: rebellious and carefree, often uses humor to mask deeper feelings.
participant_2.background: i'm here for shoplifting. i feel old. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. i will be released in about a month. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

content.text:
Hello! How is your day going? üòä.
Cut a long story short: an elementary school teacher
Hello. I'm fine. I don't really like teachers. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center.
i've been on the same assembly line for 15 years .
How old are you?
i am in my 20s my brother has a son .. Also, try to guess: i'm fluent in ...
English?
english spanish and french, funny you :)
Do you like languages?
no languages , i am a redneck with a big old beard. how are you tonight ?
Going to hang out with my friends. How do you like to spend time?
oh i play with them over the internet on the x box . what do you do for a living ?
I don't have a job.
are you married ? i'm single bc i could never just love one person . üòù
I'm single too.
me too ! never to old for rap ! i love going out to eat .
I feel old for evererything . What do you like to eat?
i play football , play with my dog and try to keep fit .
What is your dog's name?
jessie. how are you ?
I don't have a dog. I prefer cats.
dogs name is alfred what s yours
I don't have a dog sorry
my tw kids are the best , really . its just a struggle .
Thank you
i am really busy lately , but managing the restaurant with my brothers is great ! how are you doing tonight ? üòÅ
